Package client

Class ServerHandler

java.lang.Object
client.ServerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkHandler
public class ServerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkHandler
Manages communication from and to the server

    • sendSetUpGame

      public void sendSetUpGame​(java.lang.String nickname, java.util.Date date, int numPlayers)
      Prepares the request of SetUpGame with information about the player and the game
      Parameters:
      nickname - The requested username
      date - The date of birth
      numPlayers - The number of players of the game to be created (irrelevant if the player is joining an existing game)
